title: AI Notes App
description: A smart note-taking application with AI-powered summarization and organization features. Users can login, view their note history, and get automatic summaries of their content.

title: QR Analytics Dashboard
description: A comprehensive analytics platform for tracking QR code scans with real-time data visualization and PDF report generation. Used by small businesses to track marketing campaign effectiveness.

title: Cover Letter Portfolio
description: A dynamic portfolio that generates tailored cover letters based on job descriptions. Includes responsive design, dark mode, and PDF export functionality.

title: Travel Expense Tracker
description: Mobile app for tracking travel expenses with currency conversion and receipt scanning. Built for digital nomads and frequent travelers.
